name: keratinize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change into, or to change so as to contain, keratin (= a strong natural protein, the main substance that forms hair, nails, horns, feathers, etc.): The skin begins to keratinize quickly. In vitamin A deficiency, the cornea keratinizes and becomes opaque.
More examplesFewer examplesWithin a few weeks these young cells migrate to the surface, flatten and keratinize.The cells of the hoof wall die as they keratinize.The epithelium appears healthy and has keratinized profusely.
